messages.title: Local Candidate for Local People
messages.content: On 8 June, families in Eastleigh can choose between a labour government that stands up for the many, or the Tories who only look after a privileged few.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Defend our NHS and tackle the care crisis
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give the NHS and social care services the money they need and join up services from hospital to home.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give all children a chance to thrive
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide universal free school meals for primary school children and reduce class sizes.
Build more than one million new homes in five years, inside council and private rent.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect living standards and create jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour and invest in infrastructure, skills, and new technology.

mentions.tacticalSituation: IF EVERY LABOUR SUPPORTER VOTED LABOUR INSTEAD OF TACTICALLY VOTING FOR THE LIB DEMS, EASTLEIGH WOULD HAVE A LABOUR MP

issues.education: Provide universal free school meals for primary school children and reduce class sizes.
issues.health: Defend our NHS and tackle the care crisis - Give the NHS and social care services the money they need and join up services from hospital to home.
issues.labourEmployment: Protect living standards and create jobs - Introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour and invest in infrastructure, skills and new technology.

community.content: Provide affordable homes to rent - Build more than one million new homes in five years, including council and private rent.

images.caption: Jill Payne - Your Labour Parliamentary Candidate

examples: Build more than one million new homes in five years.
Introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour.
On 8 June, families in Eastleigh can choose between a labour government that stands up for the many, or the Tories who only look after a privileged few.
Give the NHS and social care services the money they need and join up services from hospital to home.
Give all children a chance to thrive.
Provide universal free school meals for primary school children and reduce class sizes.
Build more than one million new homes in five years, including council and private rent.
Introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour and invest in infrastructure, skills and new technology.

Give the NHS and social care services the money they need and join up services from hospital to home.
Provide universal free school meals for primary school children and reduce class sizes.
Introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour.
Protect living standards and create jobs.
THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS WILL SAY AND DO ANYTHING TO GET ELECTED
